prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing love greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "music, drugs and kisses"
Style: üìª Retro Vintage
Tone: üòÑ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: Spencer 
From: Mursal
Message: "Thank you for existing ‚ô•Ô∏è"

Reference: "Turn us into movie stars"

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details





- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "love" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics, classic typography, warm nostalgic colors, and mid-century design elements

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a love card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics, classic typography, warm nostalgic colors, and mid-century design elements

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Thank you for existing ‚ô•Ô∏è" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics, classic typography, warm nostalgic colors, and mid-century design elements

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics, classic typography, warm nostalgic colors, and mid-century design elements

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card, 9:16 ratio. Flat 2D illustrated artwork in a retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics. The composition depicts a cartoon couple on a red carpet, styled as \"movie stars.\" The male character wears a tuxedo with a black bowtie and a white baseball cap, with large headphones on. He has a beard and is smiling broadly, holding a golden award statuette. The female character, with dark hair styled in a retro updo and wearing large hoop earrings and a sparkling, patterned dress, leans in as if to kiss the award. Both characters are stylized with simplified, friendly features. In the background, paparazzi with cameras are visible, hinted at with simplified outlines. Stylized starbursts and circles in yellow and green are scattered across the background. The text \"TO SPENCER\" is prominently displayed at the bottom in a bold, yellow, stylized retro font with an orange outline. The overall mood is humorous and lighthearted, capturing a celebratory and glamorous moment with a playful, exaggerated style. The artwork extends to the edges with a full-bleed background.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card, 9:16 ratio. Flat 2D illustrated artwork in a retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics, maintaining the warm and nostalgic color palette of orange, yellow, teal, and muted green. The design is simple and subtly creative, offering a peaceful closure. It features a scattering of stylized, abstract shapes reminiscent of musical notes or confetti in muted yellow and green, arranged towards the center and left side of the card. A few stylized starbursts in yellow are also present. The bottom-right corner, approximately 1 inch square, is left completely clear for a QR code. There is no text or people. The design evokes a sense of lingering celebration and artistic charm, complementing the front cover without repeating its main elements directly.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior page of a greeting card, 9:16 ratio. Flat 2D illustrated artwork in a retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics, using the established warm and nostalgic color palette of orange, yellow, teal, and muted green. This page features a stylized, whimsical scene related to music and celebration, with no people. It could depict abstract representations of sound waves or musical instruments rendered in the retro style, perhaps incorporating playful, exaggerated shapes like oversized, glowing vacuum tubes or stylized microphones against a backdrop of soft, out-of-focus colored circles. The overall mood is humorous and lighthearted, with creative use of patterns and textures, such as subtle halftone dots or irregular line work. The design feels innovative and unexpected, contributing to the narrative without explicit characters.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior page of a greeting card, 9:16 ratio. Flat 2D illustrated artwork in a retro vintage style with 1950s-60s aesthetics, using the established warm and nostalgic color palette of orange, yellow, teal, and muted green. The page is designed to artistically frame the message \"Thank you for existing ‚ô•Ô∏è.\" The message is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script with a pen-like appearance, featuring natural ink flow and slight line weight variations. The script is elegant, flowing, and warm. The surrounding decorative artwork is innovative and unexpected, moving beyond typical florals. It could incorporate abstract, geometric shapes, stylized musical motifs like treble clefs or record players, or subtle, patterned textures that harmonize with the overall mid-century aesthetic. The colors of the decorative elements complement the handwriting and the card's palette. The mood is heartfelt and celebratory, serving as the emotional climax of the card's visual story. The artwork extends to the edges with a full-bleed background."
}
```

generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a love greeting card with a retro vintage, 1950s-60s aesthetic. The artwork features a minimalist, flat 2D illustration on a muted sage green background. The composition is clean and uncluttered, with the primary visual element being a vintage vinyl record. A stylized, disembodied hand with pale skin tone and subtly manicured nails in a coral hue is delicately placing the needle onto the record. The record itself is dark brown with visible grooves and a central label that is a warm orange, featuring a small, stylized heart in a darker red. The overall color palette is warm and nostalgic, utilizing muted tones and a limited color scheme to maintain a cohesive feel with the other card elements. This design provides a serene and artistic conclusion, subtly referencing the music theme introduced on the front cover without any text or people, leaving ample space for a QR code in the bottom-right corner. The style is illustrative and graphic, with clean lines and solid color blocks.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior:
Left interior page of a greeting card with a retro vintage, humorous, and lighthearted tone, in a 9:16 ratio. The artwork is flat 2D with a full-bleed background. The scene depicts a charming, stylized apothecary or chemist's shop setup, rendered in a 1950s-60s aesthetic. The color palette is warm and nostalgic, featuring dominant shades of golden yellow for the floor and background, with accents of muted orange for the walls and wood cabinetry.

The focal point is a wooden shelf against an orange wall, displaying three clear glass jars with light teal lids. Each jar contains a different assortment of colorful, candy-like pills or capsules. The first jar, labeled "GIGGLE FITS" on a cream-colored rectangular label, is filled with orange and red oval pills. The second jar, labeled "EUPHORIA ELIXIR" on a similar label, contains green capsules and some small green spheres. The third jar, labeled "INSTANT CHARISMA" on its label, is filled with yellow and orange elongated capsules.

Below this shelf, another wooden shelf is visible, holding two more glass jars with light teal lids and a green glass bottle. The first jar on this lower shelf, labeled "HAPPY PILLS" on a cream label, contains yellow and white pills. The second jar, labeled "BLISS TABLETS" on a cream label, is filled with orange pills. To the right of these jars sits a tall, slender green glass bottle with a light teal cap and a simple, stylized green leaf emblem on a light green square within a darker green rectangle.

In the foreground, on a yellow tiled floor with faint grid lines, rests a light cream-colored mortar and pestle. The mortar is filled with a chaotic, vibrant mix of small, multicolored pills and capsules, mirroring the contents of the jars. A small, detached part of the mortar, acting as a scoop, has spilled a portion of these colorful pills onto the floor. Scattered across the yellow tiled floor are subtle, charming decorative elements: several light green, solid hearts and stylized green musical notes, evoking the theme of music and love. The overall composition is clean, with bold shapes and flat colors, creating a playful and whimsical visual narrative consistent with a retro vintage style.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a circular arrangement of stylized, retro-vintage lipstick kisses in varying shades of coral and pink, forming a wreath. The central area is occupied by the handwritten cursive message "Thank you for existing", rendered in a dark, elegant script with a slight ink-bleed effect, positioned above a small, stylized red heart. The background is a soft, creamy off-white with subtle textured paper effect. A thin, golden-yellow border frames the entire design, with subtle, stylized floral corner embellishments in a muted orange and green. The overall aesthetic is warm, playful, and distinctly mid-century inspired.
